enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Chair Thorgeirsson introduced a technical paper on estimation, harvesting and accounting of harvested wood products.

The US suggested that Parties distinguish between exporting and importing in their reporting, while TUVALU, for AOSIS, cautioned against approaches not accounting for products harvested in developing countries and transferred to developed countries.
Parties agreed that this is an issue for the second commitment period and to consider this at SBSTA-20.
